thresholds_and_metrics_for_anomaly_detec.threshold: Deviation greater than 1 cm from intended depth
thresholds_and_metrics_for_anomaly_detec.description: Monitors if the cut is too shallow or too deep compared to the intended depth.
thresholds_and_metrics_for_anomaly_detec.detection: Measurement tools or visual inspection show inconsistencies in the cut depth.

thresholds_and_metrics_for_anomaly_detec.threshold: Cutting speed deviates by more than 20% from average speed for material
thresholds_and_metrics_for_anomaly_detec.description: Monitors the speed at which cutting is being done.
thresholds_and_metrics_for_anomaly_detec.detection: Excessively fast or slow cutting may indicate fatigue, tool issues, or improper technique.

thresholds_and_metrics_for_anomaly_detec.threshold: Force applied exceeds 15 N for soft materials or less than 5 N for tough materials
thresholds_and_metrics_for_anomaly_detec.description: Monitors if excessive or insufficient force is applied during cutting.
thresholds_and_metrics_for_anomaly_detec.detection: Tactile feedback or visible tool resistance is inconsistent with typical force needed.

thresholds_and_metrics_for_anomaly_detec.threshold: Movement exceeding 5 mm during the cut
thresholds_and_metrics_for_anomaly_detec.description: Measures object stability during the cut.
thresholds_and_metrics_for_anomaly_detec.detection: Visual or tactile feedback indicates unwanted object movement, leading to miscuts.

thresholds_and_metrics_for_anomaly_detec.threshold: Angle deviation greater than 10 degrees from ideal cutting angle
thresholds_and_metrics_for_anomaly_detec.description: Checks if the blade is properly aligned with the object to ensure straight cuts.
thresholds_and_metrics_for_anomaly_detec.detection: Visual inspection or measurement tools show significant misalignment.

thresholds_and_metrics_for_anomaly_detec.threshold: Blade dullness exceeding 20% wear, or bending of blade beyond 2 mm
thresholds_and_metrics_for_anomaly_detec.description: Monitors the condition of the cutting tool.
thresholds_and_metrics_for_anomaly_detec.detection: Difficulty in cutting, increased resistance, or rough edges indicate tool degradation.

thresholds_and_metrics_for_anomaly_detec.threshold: Deviation greater than 5% from the intended path
thresholds_and_metrics_for_anomaly_detec.description: Monitors the accuracy of the cut relative to the target guide or line.
thresholds_and_metrics_for_anomaly_detec.detection: Visual or measuring feedback shows significant misalignment from the intended path.

thresholds_and_metrics_for_anomaly_detec.threshold: Tool or object slipping by more than 3 cm during cutting
thresholds_and_metrics_for_anomaly_detec.description: Monitors whether the tool or object remains stable during the task.
thresholds_and_metrics_for_anomaly_detec.detection: Tactile feedback or visual observation indicates instability or slippage.

thresholds_and_metrics_for_anomaly_detec.threshold: Material temperature deviates more than 5Â°C from ideal cutting conditions
thresholds_and_metrics_for_anomaly_detec.description: Monitors material temperature to ensure optimal cutting conditions.
thresholds_and_metrics_for_anomaly_detec.detection: Change in texture or resistance indicating a temperature anomaly.

thresholds_and_metrics_for_anomaly_detec.threshold: Hardness variation greater than 10% compared to expected material properties
thresholds_and_metrics_for_anomaly_detec.description: Monitors material consistency to detect hardness discrepancies.
thresholds_and_metrics_for_anomaly_detec.detection: Tactile feedback or resistance changes during cutting, suggesting an unexpected material hardness.
